Viewing the Project Menu

The Project menu is always available on the main window, regardless of the component selected from the upper pane. Depending upon the privileges assigned to you and the activities you need to perform, some options may not be enabled.

New

Start the New Project Wizard, and create a new project.

Open

Start the Open Project Wizard, and open an existing project.

Close

Close the current project.

Properties

Review or change the current project’s properties.

Access Rights

Review or change the current project’s access rights.

Open Shortcut

Open a project view window or View Comparison window using a shortcut. The shortcut displays each view in the configuration it had at the time the shortcut was created.

Save Shortcut as

Create a new shortcut to the current project view or View Comparison window. Shortcuts are usually saved to your desktop. The shortcut appears near the bottom of the Project menu as the most recently opened project view.

Delete

Delete a project.

Connection Properties

Review the current server description, address, endpoint, user name, and logon time.

Recent Projects

Reopen a recently opened project view or View Comparison window.

Exit

Exit the application.
